widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5,5),size = (120,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# index 0 is the MenuText, MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (130,5),size = (25,25),png = 2),# index 1 i direction pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160,5),size = (270,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 3),# index 2 is remote name/number MultiContentEntryText(pos = (440,5),size = (60,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 4),# index 3 is length of call MultiContentEntryText(pos = (510,5),size = (225,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER,text = 5),# index 4 is my number/name for number ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",18)], "itemHeight": 30}
